languages.text: "Надеюсь, другие силы Империума в Просторе подхватят это начинание. Довольно всякой мерзости шляться по владениям Империума без дозволения и присмотра!"

"I hope the other Imperium forces in the Expanse will take note and continue in this vein. We must put a stop to all the foulness currently roaming the Imperium's domain without licence or oversight!"
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, другие силы Империума в Просторе подхватят это начинание. Довольно всякой мерзости шляться по владениям Империума без дозволения и присмотра!"

traits.locale_text: "I hope the other Imperium forces in the Expanse will take note and continue in this vein. We must put a stop to all the foulness currently roaming the Imperium's domain without licence or oversight!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I hope the other Imperium forces in the Expanse will take note and continue in this vein. We must put a stop to all the foulness currently roaming the Imperium's domain without licence or oversight!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I hope the other Imperium forces in the Expanse will take note and continue in this vein. We must put a stop to all the foulness currently roaming the Imperium's domain without licence or oversight!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I hope the other Imperium forces in the Expanse will take note and continue in this vein. We must put a stop to all the foulness currently roaming the Imperium's domain without licence or oversight!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我希望科罗努斯扩区中其他的帝国部队也能注意到这一点，并加以效仿。那些胆敢在帝国领土上无法无天的邪恶之敌，必须加以制止！”
languages.original_text: "I hope the other Imperium forces in the Expanse will take note and continue in this vein. We must put a stop to all the foulness currently roaming the Imperium's domain without licence or oversight!"

traits.locale_text: “我希望科罗努斯扩区中其他的帝国部队也能注意到这一点，并加以效仿。那些胆敢在帝国领土上无法无天的邪恶之敌，必须加以制止！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « J'espère que les forces impériales stationnées dans les Étendues continueront sur la même lancée. Il faut absolument empêcher ces abominations de circuler dans le domaine de l'Imperium sans autorisation, et surtout sans surveillance ! »
languages.original_text: "I hope the other Imperium forces in the Expanse will take note and continue in this vein. We must put a stop to all the foulness currently roaming the Imperium's domain without licence or oversight!"

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que les forces impériales stationnées dans les Étendues continueront sur la même lancée. Il faut absolument empêcher ces abominations de circuler dans le domaine de l'Imperium sans autorisation, et surtout sans surveillance ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Espero que el resto de fuerzas del Imperium en la Extensión tomen nota y sigan nuestro ejemplo. Debemos poner fin a la inmundicia que recorre el Imperium, ¡sin licencia ni vista gorda!».
languages.original_text: "I hope the other Imperium forces in the Expanse will take note and continue in this vein. We must put a stop to all the foulness currently roaming the Imperium's domain without licence or oversight!"

traits.locale_text: «Espero que el resto de fuerzas del Imperium en la Extensión tomen nota y sigan nuestro ejemplo. Debemos poner fin a la inmundicia que recorre el Imperium, ¡sin licencia ni vista gorda!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「エクスパンスにいる他の帝国軍がこの流れに注目し、注視を続けてくれると願います。現在、帝国の領域を無許可、無監督で徘徊している汚らわしいものすべてに歯止めをかけなければなりません！」
languages.original_text: "I hope the other Imperium forces in the Expanse will take note and continue in this vein. We must put a stop to all the foulness currently roaming the Imperium's domain without licence or oversight!"

traits.locale_text: 「エクスパンスにいる他の帝国軍がこの流れに注目し、注視を続けてくれると願います。現在、帝国の領域を無許可、無監督で徘徊している汚らわしいものすべてに歯止めをかけなければなりません！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, die anderen Truppen des Imperiums in der Ausdehnung nehmen davon Notiz und setzen unsere Bemühungen fort. Wir müssen all die Fäulnis ausmerzen, die ohne Erlaubnis oder Kontrolle im Reich des Imperiums umherstreift!"
languages.original_text: "I hope the other Imperium forces in the Expanse will take note and continue in this vein. We must put a stop to all the foulness currently roaming the Imperium's domain without licence or oversight!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, die anderen Truppen des Imperiums in der Ausdehnung nehmen davon Notiz und setzen unsere Bemühungen fort. Wir müssen all die Fäulnis ausmerzen, die ohne Erlaubnis oder Kontrolle im Reich des Imperiums umherstreift!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I hope the other Imperium forces in the Expanse will take note and continue in this vein. We must put a stop to all the foulness currently roaming the Imperium's domain without licence or oversight!"

languages.text: "Umarım Enginlik'teki diğer İmparatorluk kuvvetleri derslerini alır ve bizim gibi hareket eder. İmparatorluk topraklarında lisanssız, denetimsiz gezinen kötülüğe bir nokta koymalıyız."
languages.original_text: "I hope the other Imperium forces in the Expanse will take note and continue in this vein. We must put a stop to all the foulness currently roaming the Imperium's domain without licence or oversight!"

traits.locale_text: "Umarım Enginlik'teki diğer İmparatorluk kuvvetleri derslerini alır ve aynı şekilde devam eder. İmparatorluk topraklarında lisanssız ve denetimsiz şekilde gezinen ahlaksızlığa bir nokta koymalıyız."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
